sentence.Network_en: Donkeys are related to horses, and both are part of the equine family.

sentence.Network_en: The only available hyperimmune serum was of equine origin.
sentence.Network_cn: 唯一可得到的超免疫血清来源于马.

sentence.Network_en: Cattle are immune to equine infections anemia.
sentence.Network_cn: 牛不感染马传染性贫血.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Latin equinus, from equus 'horse'

entry.def: Equine means connected with or relating to horses.

means.word_mean: 1. hoofed mammals having slender legs and a flat coat with a narrow mane along the back of the neck
2. of or belonging to the family Equidae
